doc:
"Larry ""Flash"" Jenkins" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_%22Flash%22_Jenkins 0 Larry "Flash" Jenkins (born May 10, 1955) is an American actor, film director, producer, and screenwriter. Jenkins starred in the television series The White Shadow as Wardell Stone, Bay City Blues and Finder of Lost Loves. Jenkins is also known for such films as Ferris Bueller's Day Off and the role of "Gummy" in Fletch. Larry_"_Flash_"_Jenkins ( born May_10_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor , film_director , producer , and screenwriter . Jenkins starred in the_television_series The_White_Shadow as Wardell_Stone , Bay_City_Blues and Finder of Lost Loves . Jenkins is_also_known for such_films as Ferris_Bueller 's_Day Off and the_role of " Gummy " in Fletch .
